skill.name: postmortem-writing
skill.description: Write effective blameless postmortems with root cause analysis, timelines, and action items. Use when conducting incident reviews, writing postmortem documents, or improving incident response processes.
skill.summary: Write effective blameless postmortems with root cause analysis, timelines, and action items. Use whe...
skill.author: wshobson

security_audit.summary: The skill is a static markdown guide with templates and facilitation steps. No executable code, file access, environment access, or network behavior is present. Risk appears minimal.

content.user_title: Write blameless postmortems with clear actions
content.value_statement: Incident reviews are slow and inconsistent without a clear structure. This skill provides templates and facilitation steps to produce blameless, actionable postmortems.
actual_capabilities: Provides a standard postmortem template with sections and timeline table
Includes a 5 Whys analysis template for root cause analysis
Offers a quick postmortem format for minor incidents
Supplies a facilitation agenda for a blameless meeting
Lists postmortem triggers, best practices, and anti-patterns
limitations: Does not collect logs, metrics, or incident data
Does not integrate with ticketing or alerting tools
Does not validate timelines, impact numbers, or root cause accuracy
Does not provide legal or compliance review

use_cases.title: Standardize postmortems
use_cases.description: Create consistent postmortem documents across teams using a shared structure.

use_cases.title: Run a blameless review
use_cases.description: Facilitate a focused review with a clear agenda and owned action items.

use_cases.title: Improve follow-up actions
use_cases.description: Turn incident learnings into prioritized, assigned improvement tasks.

prompt_templates.title: Quick postmortem
prompt_templates.prompt: Draft a quick postmortem for a 12 minute latency spike after a cache flush. Include timeline, root cause, fix, and lessons.

prompt_templates.title: Standard postmortem
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a full postmortem with summary, impact, timeline, detection, response, root cause, lessons, and action items for a 45 minute checkout outage.

prompt_templates.title: 5 Whys analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a 5 Whys analysis for a database connection exhaustion incident and list systemic improvements.

prompt_templates.title: Facilitation agenda
prompt_templates.prompt: Provide a 60 minute facilitation agenda for a blameless postmortem meeting with time boxes and goals.

output_examples.input: Write a postmortem summary and action items for a 30 minute API outage caused by a bad config deploy.
output: Executive summary with duration, impact, and root cause
Timeline of key detection, diagnosis, and recovery steps
Action items with owners and due dates

best_practices: Focus on systems rather than individuals
Assign owners and due dates for actions

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. It is plain text guidance and templates that work in any assistant workflow.

faq.question: What are the limits of the skill?
faq.answer: It does not gather incident data or verify facts. You must supply accurate details.

faq.question: Can it integrate with ticketing tools?
faq.answer: No direct integration. It can suggest action items you then file in your system.

faq.question: Does it access or store my data?
faq.answer: No. The skill is static content with no data access or storage behavior.

faq.question: How do I troubleshoot weak outputs?
faq.answer: Provide concrete times, impact metrics, and decisions, then ask for a rewrite.

faq.question: How does it compare to a generic writing prompt?
faq.answer: It provides structured templates and facilitation guidance tailored to postmortems.
